700511f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - 173rd Street
700511f-a.text:
Boston Road (extreme left), north from but not including Suburban
Place, showing the thoroumhfare making a sharp bend at East 173rd Street.
The 5-story building, on the extreme right, is at the N.E. corner of
Seabury Place and East 172nd Street, and to its left appear the rears of
four buildings facing on the west side of Minford Place, between East
172nd and East 173rd Streets, bearing Nos. 1547 to 1555. The frame
dwellings on the west side of Boston Road from Suburban Place to East
173rd Street, were later razed and on their site now (1938) stands Public
School No. 98.
About 1915.
Brown Brothers.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
